links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Erik Bauersfeld''' ([[28 June]], [[1922]] - [[4 April]], [[2016]]) was an American radio dramatist. In the [[Mind's Eye]]'s production of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'', he provided the voices of [[Théoden]], [[Boromir]] and a herbmaster.
